backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, booking leads, and rate card upload with strict admin/user authorization and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking UI access-control features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for the appâ€™s light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, actor initialization, and routing between login, booking, leads, and rate card pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with header, footer, navigation, share dialog, and conditional admin-only access to the Leads section.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple component that displays the square or wide BISMI CABS logo from static assets.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a styled recovery screen with reload support.
frontend/src/components/RatePricingSecti: Renders pricing tables and cards for various vehicle types, additional info, local transfer, and rental rates with responsive layouts.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Displays the site's canonical URL with buttons to copy it or open it in a new tab, including copy feedback state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for booking leads, rate cards, uploads, and admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config with custom light and dark theme variables for a cab-service style UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: Implements a validated booking form requiring Internet Identity login and submits new leads via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Admin-only leads page that handles authentication, permission checks, and displays booking leads with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity that shows login controls and navigation options, including admin-only leads access.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Rate card page that allows authenticated admins to upload and download rate card files and view pricing sections.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Generates a canonical shareable app URL, optionally including canisterId, and provides a helper to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility to download a given byte array as a file by creating a Blob and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings or hash routes using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, typography, animations, and scanning paths.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current BISMI CABS website features, branding tasks, booking/leads functionality, and architectural notes. Includes known issues, role-based access needs, and a list of existing feature records with versions and requirement IDs.
